passages.text:
Stranger: Hello, stranger...
[[Hello? Can I help you?]]
[[...]]
passages.name: Stranger Intro

passages.text:
Stranger: There's no reason to be scared...As long as you prove to be sharp.
[[Ox|uhm...]]

Stranger: I have a riddle for you. I want to make a guess. If you guess right, you'll be fine.If not, there will be consequences.
[[Eagle|Why do you talk to me like that? What do you want?]]
[[Ox|...]]
[[Human|I don't know what riddle means.]]

links.name: Eagle|Why do you talk to me like that? What do you want?
links.link: Eagle|Why do you talk to me like that? What do you want?

links.name: Human|I don't know what riddle means.
links.link: Human|I don't know what riddle means.

passages.name: Hello? Can I help you?

passages.text:
Stranger: Don't be scared
[[Ox|uhh...]]
[[Lion|JUST FUCKING LET ME GO!]]
passages.name: uhm...

passages.text:
Stranger: I told you not to be scared
[[Ox|AH!]]
passages.name: uhh...

passages.text:
Stranger: If I were you, I'd listen to me or there will be...consequences
[[Ox|uhh...]]
[[Lion|What the fuck do you want?]]

links.name: Lion|What the fuck do you want?
links.link: Lion|What the fuck do you want?

passages.name: JUST FUCKING LET ME GO!
AH!

passages.text:
Stranger: I have a riddle for you.
Eon: What?
Stranger: A riddle.
[[Human|I don't know what riddle means.]]
[[Ox|Okay, tell me.]]

links.name: Human|I don't know what riddle means.
links.link: Human|I don't know what riddle means.

passages.name: What the fuck do you want?

passages.text:
Stranger: ...
Stranger: Are you from fucking Mars? How do you not know what riddles are?
Eon: I just don't man. Sorry.
Stranger: *sigh* OKay, I'll just explain then. It's like a puzzle you solve.
[[Human|Okay, but what's a puzzle?]]
[[Ox|uhm...]]
passages.name: I don't know what riddle means.

passages.text:
Stranger: I have a riddle for you. I want you to make a guess.
Eon:...
Stranger: If you guess right, you'll be fine. If not, there will be consequences.
[[Eagle|What if I say no?]]
[[Ox|...]]
[[Human|I don't know what riddle means.]]

links.name: Human|I don't know what riddle means.
links.link: Human|I don't know what riddle means.

passages.name: Why do you talk to me like that? What do you want?

passages.text:
Stranger: Then you'll lose by default and face the consequences.
Eon: And what are those?
Stranger: I cannot tell. That's a surprise.
[[Ox|Okay, tell me.]]
[[Human|I don't know what riddle means.]]
[[Eagle|And may I ask who you are?]]
[[Lion|What the fuck do you want?]]

links.name: Human|I don't know what riddle means.
links.link: Human|I don't know what riddle means.

links.name: Eagle|And may I ask who you are?
links.link: Eagle|And may I ask who you are?

links.name: Lion|What the fuck do you want?
links.link: Lion|What the fuck do you want?

passages.name: What if I say no?

passages.text:
Stranger: Okay, here it comes...
[[Ox|Ok.]]
passages.name: Okay, tell me.

passages.text:
Stranger: I am the riddle master. I am ancient.
Eon: I think I know who you are.
Stranger: Is that so? Then tell me my name.
[[Eagle|You are a Sphynix, master of riddles and father of terror.]]

links.name: Eagle|You are a Sphynix, master of riddles and father of terror.
links.link: Eagle|You are a Sphynix, master of riddles and father of terror.

passages.name: And may I ask who you are?

passages.text:
Stranger: I have to admit, no one called me by that in a very long time. You impressed me girl.
Eon: And I guess you'll eat me if I guess incorrectly?
Stranger: No, not anymore. I developed acid reflux over the years, but I have other methods of terror. Anyway, as you know by now there is no other option for you to answer my riddle. Are you ready?
[[Eagle|Ok.]]
passages.name: You are a Sphynix, master of riddles and father of terror.

passages.text:
Stranger: What is something that you get to keep after you give it to someone?
Stranger: Take your time because if you fail, there will be consequences.
[[Human|uhmm...]]
[[Ox|What kind of consequences?]]
[[Eagle|hmmm...]]
passages.name: Ok.

passages.text:
Stranger: ...What?
Eon: I don't know what that means.
Stranger: Are you fucking kidding me?
Eon: Why would I do that?
Stranger: I'll tell you something and you'll try to guess what I mean.
Eon: Oh okay, it's a guessing gmae, but...
Stranger: QUIET NOW!
[[Human|Ok.]]
passages.name: Okay, but what's a puzzle?

passages.text:
Eon: ...
[[Ox|(Ox Riddle 1)]]
[[ Human|ermm...]]
[[Eagle|(Eagle Riddle 1)]]
passages.name: uhmm...

passages.text:
Eon: //It's useless to discuss is at this point. Just think.//
[[Ox|(Ox Riddle 1)]]
[[Human|ermm...]]
[[Eagle|(Eagle Riddle 1)]]
passages.name: What kind of consequences?

passages.text:
Eon: ...
[[Ox|(Ox Riddle 1)]]
[[ Human|ermm...]]
[[Eagle|(Eagle Riddle 1)]]
passages.name: hmmm...

passages.text:
Eon: //What's something that you keep after giving it?//
Eon: //...//
Eon: I'm sorry, do you mind repeating the riddle again?
[[Ox|(Ox Riddle 2)]]
passages.name: (Ox Riddle 1)

passages.text:
Eon: //Sounds like STDs fits this definition perfectly. You still keep them after you give it to someone!//
[[Human|Okay, I think it's STDs]]
[[Ox|(Ox Riddle 1)]]
passages.name: ermm...

passages.text:
Eon: //This dude must be super old. It might be a lame word play.//
Eon: So it can be advice or word. But technically you don't need to keep any of those after giving them.
[[Human|Okay, I think it's STDs]]
[[Ox|(Ox Riddle 1)]]
[[Eagle|(Eagle Guess 1)]]
passages.name: (Eagle Riddle 1)

passages.text:
Stranger: Ehmmm...
Eon: What? You give them and still keep them.
Stranger: I guess that's true...
Stranger: But that was not the answer I expected. So, I'll ask another now.
[[Human|(Human Guess 2)]]
passages.name: Okay, I think it's STDs

passages.text:
Eon: //I guess you are expected to keep your word after you give it.//
Eon: //Considering this dude's age, it's probably something old fashioned like that. I'll go for it, at least I won't get eaten.//
Eon: My guess is "word".
passages.name: (Eagle Guess 1)

passages.text:
Eon: Wait a minute! That's just cheating man, not cool!
Eon: It's my turn to ask you one now!
Stranger: You?
Eon: Yes, it's your turn to guess now.
[[Human|(Human asks riddle)]]
[[Eagle|(Eagle guess queen)]]
passages.name: (Human Guess 2)

passages.text:
Stranger: *sigh* What is something that you get to keep after you give it to someone?
Eon: Yes yes *blush* I just needed to think a little. It sounds like, hmmm...
Eon: Love probably. You gotta have love to be able to give it to someone. The more you give, the more you have?
Eon: I mean, that's what they say...
[[Ox|(Ox Answer Love 1)]]
[[Human|ermm...]]
passages.name: (Ox Riddle 2)

passages.text:
Stranger: But what if it is not? There will be consequences.
Eon: //What can the consequence be? I guess something bad.//
Eon: //He looks like a normal person. Hmmm...but this is definitely not a normla situation...//
Stranger: *Ehemmm* You still there? It's getting late.
Eon: Yeah, just one more minute.
[[Ox|(Ox Answer Love 2)]]
[[Eagle|(Eagle Answer Water 1)]]
passages.name: (Ox Answer Love 1)

passages.text:
Eon: //It has to be love, she thinks, or at least nothing else comes to mind.//
Eon: Okay, I'd guess it's love.
[[Ox|(Ox Answer Love 3)]]
passages.name: (Ox Answer Love 2)

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: (Eagle Answer Water 1)

passages.text:
Stranger: Ooooh, aren't you a sweetheart. //alligator smiles with compassion.
Stranger: But that's not correct unfortunately. You can totally love and then open up to someone, and lose it afterwards because they are actually a piece of shit!
Eon: Argh, sounds lick you have some shit going on.
Stranger: Anyway, you failed! You'll face the consequences. // And the stranger disappears, boom!
[[Ox|(Ox Announcement)]]
passages.name: (Ox Answer Love 3)

passages.text:
Eon: What is it given one, you'll have either two or none?
Stranger: ...
Eon: Think carefully. Remember, there will be consequences.
[[Human|(Human Escape 1)]]
passages.name: (Human asks riddle)

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: (Eagle guess queen)

passages.text:
Stranger: If I were you, I'd listen to me, or there would be consequences.
[[Ox|uhm...]]
[[Lion|What the fuck do you want?]]

links.name: Lion|What the fuck do you want?
links.link: Lion|What the fuck do you want?

passages.name: Just fucking let me go!

passages.text:
Eon: Holy shit, what's gonna happen now? // Eon is shaking
// speakers turned on
Stranger: TO GET OUT YOU GOTTA EAT THE EXIT WHOLE DOOR. DON'T TRY TO CHEAT, IT WON'T WORK.
Eon: The door? // Eon looks confused
[[Ox|(Ox Turnip 1)]]
[[Eagle|(Eagle Turnip 1)]]
passages.name: (Ox Announcement)

passages.text:
// Door turns into a turnip
Eon: Holy shit, that's definitely not what I expected.
Stranger: AND IT'S A BITTER ONE. HAHAHAHA.
[[Ox|(Ox Turnip 2)]]
passages.name: (Ox Turnip 1)

passages.text:
Eon: //This is really stupid. I am nottrying to get out. I'm witing to get on my train!//
Eon: //I should just pretend to eat it until my train arrives, which should be any minute now.//
Stranger: GO AHEAD!
[[Eagle|(Eagle Turnip 2)]]
passages.name: (Eagle Turnip 1)

passages.text:
Eon: Okey, I can eat a turnip. Whatever.
Eon:[bites turnip]
Eon: //It's hard, and bitter just like he said//
[[(Ox)]]
passages.name: (Ox Turnip 2)

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: (Ox)

passages.text:
Eon: [takes a small bite of turnip]
Stranger: WOW, YOU ARE A SLOW EATER
Won: Wow, I'm so full. I think I need a break.
[[Eagle|(Eagle Turnip 3)]]
passages.name: (Eagle Turnip 2)

passages.text:
// Train starts approaching
Stranger: GOTTA EAT FASTER
passages.name: (Eagle Turnip 3)
(Human Escape 1)
(Human Escape 2)
